citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:25 pm on
01-Nov-16.
The inspector arrived at the facility at 12:25 pm and knocked on the door, called the phone number and left a
message. An individual at the facility stated that the licensee was not available for the inspection.

narrative:
2.126(b)                    REPEAT
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:25 pm on
01-Nov-16.
The inspector arrived at the facility at 12:25 pm and knocked on the door, called the phone number and left a
message.  An individual at the facility stated that the licensee was not available for the inspection.
